snippet: Mrs. Cahn suggested the design for what became the first successful bag for Coach, the company she helped found: a tote modeled on a type of paper shopping bag she had used as a girl.
abstract: Lillian Cahn, founder of the Coach brand, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Cahn suggested the design for what became the first successful bag for Coach, the company she helped found: a tote modeled on a type of paper shopping bag she had used as a girl.

headline.seo: Lillian Cahn, Creator of the Coach Handbag, Dies at 89
headline.main: Lillian Cahn, Creator of the Coach Handbag, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Lillian Cahn, 89, Creator of Coach Handbag
